name: M is for Murder: EP1
description:
M is for murder : Episode 1

A short horror fps where you play as a detective, snap a few pics and get to shoot a gun.

Dev note: The game has a few small holes, but I've spent way too much time on this already...the project was a little ambitious for one person...but alas..here it is...M is for murder...episode 1...which is 3 of the 7 levels I currently have.

Thank you for checking it out from the bottom of my heart!

- DAN

@Danlocrian (IG, mainly for my music but we can have a chat there if you wanna)
